markings: Anchor in a circle over letters VA (not in Lugt).
medium: Pen and brown ink and wash on laid paper
provenance: Unknown collection, collector's mark, Anchor in a circle over letters VA (not in Lugt). [Colnaghi, London, until 1989; sold July 19, as Anonymous Italian, for £1, 250, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1989-d. 2010; bequeathed to Mia).
title: Saint Lawrence Restoring the Sight of Lucillus
